title: Christopher Ruddy - Wikipedia

title: Chris Ruddy '87C | St. John's University
snippet: Ruddy today presides over the burgeoning success of the media company that includes the news website known as Newsmax.com. The site boasts an estimated 20–30 million monthly visitors and is the third-most viewed political website in the country. Newsmax Magazine has more than 400,000 monthly readers and the company’s cable news channel, Newsmax TV, launched in 2014.
